title: My First CRUD
details: My First CRUD - My first backend project, the main porpouse of this project was learn how does nodejs deals with http requests under the hood. No framework was used here, database is a json file.

title: Posts App
details: Posts App - In this project i decided to learn about express and postgres to build an auth based application, so i built an posts app where people can share posts.

title: Stock Manager
details: Stock Manager - The main porpouse of this project was learn about mongodb & mongoose, so i built a simple application to manipulate stock.

title: Tic Tac Toe JS
details: Tic Tac Toe JS - Decided to understand how i could build an application where data flows bidirectionally, i have put some work on learning about socket.io to build a multiplayer tic tac toe game.

title: To Do Manager
details: To Do Manager - In this project i divided frontend and backend in different applications, frontend was built with react and served with nginx, while backend was built with express and sequelize.
